thread.title: Small rooms, small beds, not much in-room dining
thread.title_full: Small rooms, small beds, not much in-room dining - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jswflights
title: Small rooms, small beds, not much in-room dining
text: I requested an upgrade online at Marriott's urging to a King corner and received two small double beds instead. It was late, and I suffered through it. The room and bathroom were small. In room dining came in a bag from an adjacent restaurant. Check out had a line and only one person on duty during what normally are busy times.
